TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 49, "index": 21}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 23}, {"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 9, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}]

thought: To craft birch_button, I need to craft birch_planks first. To craft birch_planks, I need to place a stripped_birch_log into the crafting grid, and then craft it. I will first move the stripped_birch_log from slot 29 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I now have the birch_planks in the crafting grid, and I need to move them to an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
